title: Bug 108822: More efficient disk sorting logic needed for handling border values in row data
OB: During disk sorting, when sorting 40000 rows of data while specifying that the program processes data < 40000, the following operations are performed by DtE: 1.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Sort 40000 rows of data on disk. 2. Set the program to process the data less than 40000. 3. Observe the following operations performed by DtE: a. Save the file as a temporary file. b. Load the file into memory. c. Perform sorting on the data. d. Save the sorted data back to the temporary file.
